responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What does your tech stack look like?
What tools and languages do you know?
responses: Ilia loves exploring new tools and technologies and is constantly expanding his skillset. He is fluent in Python and C and has experience using SQL for working with relational databases, and using JavaScript, HTML and CSS for web development.
Bye! You can always send me a chat if you have any further questions.
